name: Banyan Tree Seychelles

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed 8 nights at the BT in early April as the last leg of our honeymoon. Given the price, we had high expectations. We were not disappointed.
reviews.title: Great for romantic honeymoon

reviews.text: Staff is a key strength of the hotel. Very friendly and attentive, always smiling, even the back office and maintenance people. Personalised service.
reviews.title: One of the paradises on earth

aka: Banyan Tree Seychelles Hotel Mahe Island
